channel.title: Victor|Li Chuang's Personal Webpage
channel.description: Recent content on Victor|Li Chuang's Personal Webpage

item.title: Biography
item.description: My name is Victor, Li Chuang. I’m currently a Year 2 PhD student of NUS Intergrative Science and Engineering Program (ISEP) under NUS Graduate School (NUSGS) starting from August 2020. I am jointly advised by Prof Kan Min-Yen from Web IR/NLP Group (WING) in School of Computing (SOC)and Prof Li Haizhou at Human Language Technology (HLT) Lab. My research interests are in Recommendation System, Conversational Recommendation System and Dialogue System.

item.title: First Post for ALL
item.description: Hi there, welcome to my personal website. This is my first time to create a website and it doesn’t seem so hard with the help of Hugo Theme and Github.io. I am using this webiste mainly for tracking of my own research progress and moreover, to help me connect it to others. Currently, I have made it bi-lingual and for a student doing NLP, it’s possible to make it multi-lingual but I will leave it to Google Translate.

item.title: Contact
item.description: For contacting, pls feel free to email me： Email Address in Google: lichuangnus[@]gmail.com Email Address in China: lc1614004「@」163.com Workplace: National University of Singapore, AS6, SOC, NUS Social Media： LinkedIn： https://www.linkedin.com/in/victorlinus/ Twitter ： https://twitter.com/VictorLi_SG/
